General.Name: Vivanco Gruppe AG
General.Description: Vivanco Gruppe AG engages in the development, procurement, and supply of equipment and connection accessories for consumer electronics, information technology, and telecommunication industries in Germany, rest of Europe, and internationally. Its products comprise smartphone accessories, including bags and sleeves, screen protectors, chargers, cables and adapters, mountings, and earphones and headsets; tablet accessories, such as bags, screen protectors, chargers, cables and adapters, and holders and pens; and computer and notebook accessories comprising mice and keyboards, headsets and microphones, speakers, hub's network card readers, notebook power supplies, cables and adapters, bags and sleeves, monitor mounts, and archiving and care products. The company also offers TV/streaming/HIFI products, including wall mounts, table stands, cable management products, satellites and antennas, video cables and adapters, audio cables and adapters, headphones and microphones, remote controls, and cleaning and care products; electric and energy products that comprise electrical accessories, warning indicators, power supplies, batteries, solar panels, and power stations; and household accessories, such as small and large devices, warning indicators, and glowing lights. In addition, it sells its products online. The company is headquartered in Ahrensburg, Germany. Vivanco Gruppe AG is a subsidiary of Xupu Electronics Technology GmbH.
